author: Ben Dickson
title: How AI can determine which coronavirus patients require hospitalization
description: As the novel coronavirus (COVID-19) continues to spread across the world, governments and hospitals are being overwhelmed with an influx of patients. Under such circumstances, one of the key challenges they must address is managing their resources and develop…
